snippet: Devin Harris scored a season-high 24 points and Atlanta rallied from a 15-point deficit to beat visiting Utah.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Atlanta Hawks beat Utah Jazz, 103-95; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Devin Harris scored a season-high 24 points and Atlanta rallied from a 15-point deficit to beat visiting Utah.

headline.seo: Hawks Rally From 15-Point Second-Half Deficit to Top Visiting Jazz
headline.main: Late Rally Lifts Hawks Over Jazz
headline.print_headline: Late Rally Lifts Hawks Over Jazz
